org.ietf.nea.pb.batch

Class PbBatchFactoryIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pb.batch.PbBatchFactoryIetf

  • public final class PbBatchFactoryIetf
extends Object
    Factory utility to create a IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message batch.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private PbBatchFactoryIetf()
      Private constructor should never be invoked.

    • Method Summary

      • createBatch

        private static PbBatch createBatch(PbBatchDirectionalityEnum direction,
                  PbBatchTypeEnum type,
                  List<? extends TnccsMessage> messages)
                            throws ValidationException
        Creates a batch with the given type and direction containing the given messages.
        Parameters:
        direction - the batch sending direction (e.g. to server or client)
        type - the batch type (e.g. server retry, close, ...)
        messages - the contained TNCCS messages
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message batch
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values
